channel.title: Get a wierd thing when running server
channel.description:
ok i get the regular starting 3 lines when i compile...heres the whole thing
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexoutOfBoundsException:17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)[/code]
ok then when i try to log on or anyone tries to log on i disconnects and they try ogain and it says they are already logged in.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 27, 2006, 07:43:41 PM[/size][hr]help me plz

item.description:
@fireshadow299 wrote:

did you put the code in that the people gave you
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 27, 2006, 08:04:44 PM[/size][hr]here it is
edit compile
@echo off
COLOR 08
title servername here
“C:Program\Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program\Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\java.exe” server
pause
